channel.title: More music... classic rock
channel.description:
I know everyone is always posting stuff like whats your favorite band and stuff, but today, my teacher said one of her students from a few years back didn't know who the beatles where. On my facebook status today, I had led zepplin lyrics... someone asked me who sung that, i said robert plant, they asked who that was, I said the singer from Led Zepplin, they then asked who led zepplin was.
I'm going to post a list of bands below, if you don't know any of them, learn them, because that's where alot of this modern music has originated from..
The Beatles Pink Floyd Jimmy Hendrix The Who Rolling Stones Led Zepplin Eagles Greatful Dead The Doors AC/DC Boston Cream Def Leppard Aerosmith Van Halen Queen Styx KISS Rush Chicago Sex Pistols Lynyrd Skynyrd The Police Black Sabbath Metallica Genesis R.E.M. Journey Kansas Bob Dylan Triumph Iron Maiden
Also people, what should be added to the list?

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:7, topic:327314”]Phil Collins.
Eric Clapton.[/quote]

Agreed.

Read full topic

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Nice list. It’s nice to see a lot of british rock.

needs moar Guns n Roses and Queen.

Read full topic

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Add Ian Gillan to that list.
And why the hell is Iron Maiden at the bottom!

Some more:
Phil Collins.
Eric Clapton.
The Shadows.
Scorpions.

Read full topic

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:327314”]Tom Petty also, as jme said.

But also what about CCR (Creedence Clearwater Revival), BTO (Bachman–Turner Overdrive), and Steppenwolf? That’s all I can think of for now. :)[/quote]

Those too

Read full topic

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

They still play all of those on mainstream radio stations. Some of them I personally don’t like at all but anyways, I think you need to add Tom Petty, or at least Jefferson Airplane/Jefferson Starship.

Nice that you have grateful dead though

Read full topic

item.title: More music... classic rock
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Kansas, Journey, and Triumph aren’t on there!

Also, Bob Dylan is by far the best lyricist and deserves a spot on there!

[quote=“reyx7, post:1, topic:327314”]if you don’t know any of them, learn them, because that’s where alot of this modern music has originated from…[/quote]My favorite band MGMT has gotten a lot of their inspiration from the hippie groups such as The Beatles, The Who, and Bob Dylan, so I know exactly what you mean.

Read full topic
